website_summaries.verdict: With similar features and functions to Samsung smartphones available on contracted plans at a fraction of the price, the J7 Sky Pro is a top pick available from Tracfone.
pros: A large 6.6-inch HD screen and fast app downloads (thanks to the popular Android Marshmallow OS) is ideal for users who want to upgrade to a well-priced smartphone
cons: Too many ads and pop-ups built into the phone and reports of bad SIM cards

customer_reviews.title: Big Screen! Long battery life! Fast performance!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a step-up from my LG Rebel. Not to say the LG Rebel wasn't a good phone, infact, it's compactness was very cool. However, the speed, large 5.5 screen and battery charge on this phone was a welcome upgrade. Update: December 5, 2018. Since many people rely on my opinion and subjective experience, I want to say the phone is remarkable for my purposes and is holding up beautifully! I also want to add that charging the phone is fast, really fast! I usually charge it when it's done to 50%. I suggest the same combination I purhcased IF you have have cell towers close by. I use Tracfone as my prepaid service.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I upgraded from cheap old phones to this. The difference is incredible. The apps actually work and the phone actually works like a phone. This new phone has certainly been a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Borger

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy J7 Sky Pro Great phone
customer_reviews.text: This Samsung Galaxy J7 Sky Pro 4G LTE is a great phone for a great price. I had many trac phones of various brands before, and this is the best one I ever owned. The screen images are excellent and the sound is loud and clear. The battery holds the charge for along time. This phone is terrific. I owned Samsung tablets before I bought this phone. I am very pleased and recommend this phone. I also bought the screen protectors and case and have a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I could not have found a better phone. It will do almost everything the expensive ones will will do and at a fraction of the cost.I only have one issue and that is when I transferred all my contacts from the last phone I did not know enough to back up everything and when I deleted my old phone it also deleted all my contacts on my new phone. I had saved a printed copy of the contacts but still had to enter 60 names into my new phone. Samsung informed of my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Everal

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, small price!
customer_reviews.text: He loves it, he got it for Christmas and loves the size and the viewing size of the screen. We to get a replacement for it when we got it because I somehow changed the language on it and it screwed up the screen but even the techs couldn't get it fixed so they replaced it without issue even though it was my fault. Great phone for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Rattail

customer_reviews.title: Good phone. Bought this for my daughter (16) to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. Bought this for my daughter (16) to use, something she could call someone on while not being tied to monthly contract, and she can still use on wifi. There are so many APPs now that you can call and text for free (while using wifi) so she hasnt even activated it yet. she really likes it, her first Samsung (switched from apple) only complaint would by the camera quality. Overall good buy!
customer_reviews.author: BrakePad

customer_reviews.title: I've been very happy with this phone and it's been a nice upgrade ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with this phone and it's been a nice upgrade from the older LG model I had been using for several years. I love the bigger screen size and it's faster too. I really miss the blinking notification light my old LG phone had, but apparently no new phones have that feature anymore, which is too bad. This phone has worked just fine with my Tracfone service too.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. I transferred my three-year-old LG Tracfone to this one, and it only took about 15mins (about 10mins to set the phone up in English and to add the wi-fi password, my email account, and so forth), and about 5 minutes to transfer over my old number & minutes. The only thing that didn't go smoothly was the $40 bundle that was supposed to show up upon activation. Only the days were added automatically. I just chatted with Tracfone and they put the minutes on for me.
customer_reviews.author: gmu20

customer_reviews.title: TracFone Samsung Galaxy J7 Sky Pro 4G LTE Prepaid Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup great 4G and uses the 5GHZ wifi at home . Runs all needed apps Arlo One Drive and Lightify with ease . Reasonable pricing with roll over minutes even to a new phone when the time comes . The phone has all the goodies a much more costly phone for far less . This was an upgrade from an earlier TracFone the old phone was backed up and all the apps were restored from the back up without issue just remember the pass words you will need them to to log thew app back in . We bought a second phone as well . Recomended
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Frank

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I had this replaced and the second one is worse than the first. Picture quality is good, but in order for me to send a message or receive messages I have to restart the phone. It constantly says "No service, can't send message" once I restart it the message sends. The problem aside from the obvious annoyance is the fact that i can't receive messages or calls. So unless I'm thinking about it or trying to send a message, people can't get through to me. That's a huge problem with having two small children in daycare while I'm at work from 3-1130 pm
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Snowball

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This phone was suppose to be a universal phone I could take to any phone place to activate. When I received the phone it was locked. Like it was someone else’s phone with a passcode already set up. I couldn’t even get it unlocked and reset it. Neither could the phone place I took it to. Waste of time. I ended up just buying a phone from the store and had to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on phone and Tracfone service
customer_reviews.text: So far, this phone and TracFone service have been just fine. This is my first smartphone after finding out that feature phones (sliders and flips) like my LG Octane were no longer available, evidently having been superseded by smartphones. I need a QWERTY keyboard for texting, but otherwise only need basic cell phone features (local camera, phone, and now texting). This phone is definitely filling my needs. I only wish the bundle Amazon had included was for 90 service days vs 60. An added bonus is that the Samsung phone's user setup is practically identical to the Samsung Galaxy Tab A I bought in early 2017, so almost no learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: T. Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and large screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on a friends recommendation, and so glad I did. This thing has an amazing battery life, large screen and is easy to use. It replaced an LG which was my first foray into a “smart” tracfone, and this is SO much nicer. I like that it has an expandable memory, I can easily see what is on the screen without “biggifying” and that it doesn’t scream tracfone when I use it out in public. My mom currently has a Jitterbug, and I am going to get one of these to help her transition out of that phone. Would highly recommend to anyone looking to upgrade their old tracfone.
customer_reviews.author: ZG

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of the phone and all the features. There's only one thing that bugs me about it, but it's a small thing. When you have the phone open and you are on social media, looking at pictures, or trying to play a game the screen times out within a few seconds unless you hold your finger on the screen somewhere. I talked to tracfone, and did what they said to do, but it still times out after a few seconds. Overall the phone excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Capek

customer_reviews.title: NO SIM CARD
customer_reviews.text: was pissed that I had to take the sim card from my phone which was incompatible and put it in new phone. I was not aware it was refurbished phone. I had to call trac phone and the service tech had to monkey around to get my phone to work. Took at least an hour on the phone with trac phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sariano

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for me
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat these for the price. Camera still needs work, but if you have a lot of light its decent enough. Better at outside sunny day stuff. I replaced a J3 that I dropped with this one. The most noticeable improvement (other then screen size) is the audio. Much better sound. YouTube playback (about all I do) is good. As far as the operating system it seems about the same. A little faster maybe. Not a person who is glued to his phone so it only costs me about $20 a month.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Braddy

customer_reviews.title: Able to switch quickly from data to wifi which saves data!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have used Tracfone for more than ten yrs., we don't like monthly contracts. The Galaxy J7 Sky Pro is the first use SmartPhones with TracFone and we are very pleased with the phone, the amount of data, calls, & texts we receive with TracFone!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Cadwallader

customer_reviews.title: Much better Tracfones than other models I've used in the past
customer_reviews.text: I love this Samsung phone. Much faster than my previous Tracfone phones, and with 16 gig of memory, I'm not running out of space any more. It may not be as flashy or fancy as offerings from the normal cell providers, but it's dirt cheap to use compared to any other plan I've found. I don't use it a lot, but it's plenty fast for me, especially compared to previous Tracfones I've had. Picture quality is really good, except in lower light situations, where the phone has trouble focusing. But call quality is quite good, so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Cool

customer_reviews.title: Great economy phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great for those of us who don't use a phone enough to justify dropping 500+ on an electronic only to play Pokemon Go. It plays all the apps and while it doesn't quite have the steam power to really plug away with most apps, it still gets the job done. I wish the picture quality was a bit better, but for the price it's an amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This is the first Tracfone with some memory to work ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Tracfone with some memory to work with...I don't use a lot of apps however the phones proceeding this one could not even deal with my limited needs. I have had it for about four months now and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jon E. Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, works with Cardboard VR
customer_reviews.text: The Tracfone bundle allowed me to carry over minutes, data and text-counts from a flip fone I had used for years, so I was left with a mountain of all three. I'm not glued to social media, so for use as a phone and occasional apps its simply a great smart phone. As it interfaces for charging via a small USB-2 port, its not compatible with Gear and other USB-C VR headsets. I use it with Cardboard VR, and with a drone controller, all to great effect. If you're looking for high end, this isn't the phone for you. If you're looking for functionality and utility at a great price, its perfect, especially with the $40 Tracfone bundle.
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Text to speech
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. Better than my LG Premier because it is slightly larger and has more storage capacity. Cons: IMO, all smart phones should have the ability to text to speech on messages. I bought it thinking it did but it does NOT. Spent hours looking on line to no avail. Downloaded several apps. from the Google store but have not found one I can use. Deducted one star because of my disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product great value.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it, compared to my son's pricey Samsung 8, almost the same performance just felt the camera resolution is a little lower. We asked ourself is it worth the $500 in difference?
customer_reviews.author: Wei-I

customer_reviews.title: Great Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This phone was purchased for my husband which does not know how to use a Smart Phone and doesn't make many calls and never texts. I have him on the Tranphone since the phone isn't used much. This phone is perfect for him. He actually seemed happy to have the ability to take photos now. More than he needs but I really like it for a backup. Price was great. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Neal

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY PHONE..
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say.... I absolutely love this phone. I was using the Samsung J3 Luna pro, but I really wanted a upgraded phone with a bigger screen. I went with this Samsung J7 Sky pro. Boy, am I so happy I did. The screen is big just like I wanted. The price is outstanding. It works flawlessly for me. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great TracFone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter whose broke her previous phone beyond repair (ok, it could have been repaired, but would have cost more than this replacement phone). This is by far the best TracFone we have owned. We've had smartphones from LG, Motorola, and Samsung in the past, but this one is the best by far, and you can't beat the price. It's large screen size allows her to see her pictures and apps clearly, and the camera(s) are much better than any previous model. I know there is a newer model out now that has replaced this one, but for my money, this is the better phone.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone, but tracphone could not activate it.I spent over 1 hour on the phone with them.I should've read all the reviews before making a purchase. Would've same me the headache.If your looking into buying this phone just know you may not be able to activate it through tracphone.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.T

customer_reviews.title: No interest in tech phones, but this is very good for a luddite like me.
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old Tracfone, I admit it, though I hate to, all the things it can do, very good. Have little interest in iPhone type devices but this is more tech than I will use properly, feels quality and is all I will need. Happy with the price, happy with the service, happy that there is no contract. So, I guess I am trying to say I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J Hynes

customer_reviews.title: COULD NOT ACTIVATE
customer_reviews.text: COULD NOT ACTIVATE. AFTER 1.5 HOURS AND 4 REPS I WAS TOLD THAT TRACFONE IS HAVING ISSUES WITH THE SAMSUNG J3 AND J7
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone but lost min text's no carry over..
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the phone, the one thing I don't like it that I had a hard time activating the phone and lost all my min, text.. they didn't carry over from my old phone. I had to call and have a rep help me.In they end tired to convince me I didn't loose anything. Guess he thought I was stupid.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone that was much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Did all of the android apps well. Battery worked well for 6 months then, when 100% charged went dead in just a few minutes. Was easy to replace . Back cover off and snaps out, new snaps in. No wires,etc in the way. Can put in extra memory just as easy at the same time. Replacement about $20, but cheaper ones for $9 online
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cell Phone
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a defective LG Optimus. Way better phone. Camera is not as sharp, yet very functional. Stronger WIFI and Bluetooth connections. Better functionality all around.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT phone - very happy w/ it
customer_reviews.text: GREAT phone - very happy w/ it. also I have dropped it a few times and no breakage or cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffela

customer_reviews.title: If only I could hear ---
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great phone if I could hear - at first I thought it was me as I ise a hearing aid, but my sister couldn't hear on it either - it makes It difficult to make phone calls. Yes, I used the speaker - and the extra volume buttons, but no luck. I finally got a Bluetooth microphone and it's better, but not perfect. I'd trade itin and get another one, but I spent so long with tracfone switching all my into to this phone - I don't want to go through that again.
customer_reviews.author: paperlady

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone as it was easy to upgrade from my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone as it was easy to upgrade from my previous and it works great for all my purposes. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: T. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Can easily transfer all information(contacts,music,photos,etc.)Whether you use SmartSwitch,or transfer wizard.
customer_reviews.text: The best phone I have ever had.Have had tracphones forever.Decided to stay with them.Was not able to use SmartSwitch for tracphone.However,I went to Internet and found on tracfone "transfer wizard".My goodness!Took all of five minutes to get everything transferred to the new phone.Hope this helps anyone that is wanting to purchase this phone and wants to stay with or go to tracfone..A great deal from "Amazon".Would definately purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mona L.Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Its a phone nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.text: Not as snabby as some of the flagship models but a good phone for the price point camera is substandard battery life is impeccable that's to be expected with only 2 GB of RAM. Otherwise it doesn't a phone is supposed to make and receive phone call and audio is okay
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A great phone!
customer_reviews.text: A great phone. A wonderful upgrade from my Alcatel that I had for several years. Everything works flawlessly. Bluetooth and Wi-fi connect effortlessly. The processor is snappy and the screen is bright and clear. Battery life is excellent. I use a 32 gig mini card and have thousands of songs on it with plenty of room left. The camera is not great but more than adequate for every day snapshots and it has a lot more features than the camera on the Alcatel did. I love this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Moseman

customer_reviews.title: App Finder SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my mother because my mother bought me a J3 for my birthday. Since I am electronically savvy, I clicked on settings then applications and disabled APP FINDER which generates spam and unwanted notifications and ads. Phone seems pretty awesome except for some of the unnecessary default apps like APP FINDER.
customer_reviews.author: capehope3

customer_reviews.title: Better value than Tracfone direct
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy this exact phone directly through Tracfone. Then I found this phone through Amazon. It was $20 less than Tracfone and included the extra minutes, text and data. They say $40 value, but actually if you check the card prices on Tracfone, this comes out to be worth more than $50 value. I replaced an LG ultimate 2 with this Galaxy J7, It is much faster and so far I love how it responds to my touch.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Norton

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied.....
customer_reviews.text: This was such a flawless experience, I just had to write a review. Phone arrived. NEW and in GREAT CONDITION. Great display, simple to operate. Airtime bundle was automatically added upon activation. Was able to transfer my minutes, text and date from my old Tracfone to the new J7 Sky Pro. No issues at all. Amazon never, ever lets me down....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and it’s a pretty great phone for the price. It’s pretty large but he likes the big screen, good for games and watching videos. Runs fast. I have an iPhone and I still like to use his to watch movies. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Kinmon

customer_reviews.title: Okay phone.
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade from my Samsung J3. However, I find that the screen has a tendency to stick. It is a similar problem that I had with the J3. The pictures are not the greatest, but they work.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this from a J3. Screen is beautiful, solid Samsung design and features. If you're stepping up from a previous Samsung model, you'll be very happy with the increased performance and ability to find features where you look for them.
customer_reviews.author: egm7691

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Needs serious updates. Has an on-going issue with bluetooth. Unable to sync with navigation on my car. My old $10.00 flip phone synced in 10 seconds. Amazon no help, Samsung can't help. Unable to return it as 30 days has passed. Google bluetooth issues there are so many complaints for this piece of junk phone. Don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The phone will put you into a new experience.
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone but IT'S way smarter the me. You can do so much with this phone even file a claim after a collision, with photos. It's unbelievable I still can't get over the fact it knows where you have been and the asks you to rate the location.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, there is nothing not to love.
customer_reviews.text: Going from one Samsung to another could not have been easier. Switching my phone number from one Tracfone to another also could not have been easier. It's only be a few days but this phone is fast and easy to use. The one negative is it's large size. For a guy to carry in a shirt pocket or pants pocket, it is too big. I would have preferred this speed in a smaller housing.
customer_reviews.author: pnf44

customer_reviews.title: Not too great
customer_reviews.text: I liked this a lot, originally. Now it's extremely unstable. It reboots itself periodically and I can't finish a complete conversation or browse the web without it stopping. I wouldn't buy it again, and not sure I would buy another Galaxy model in the future. It needs to be replaced soon, because it's currently almost unusable.
customer_reviews.author: John55

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. I just graduated from a $44. TracFone to a $100. TracFone, a big deal, for me! This Samsung has features that I never knew about. I'm a happy, (simple), man. Oh, the only thing I'm not sure about is whether I received the $40.00 phone refill card I was promised. There was nothing in the package. Maybe it was automatic, when I activated my phone?
customer_reviews.author: Evan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these phones for my girls for Christmas a couple of years ago. The girls like them alot they are very similar to my Galaxy phone.
customer_reviews.author: ipause4coke

customer_reviews.title: Not The Old LG 840G Tracfone !!
customer_reviews.text: All The Apps Are Both Awesome And Mind Boggling ! The Minutes Were Into The Thousands Year After Year On The LG !! Only Used For Texting And a Rare Call ! Now The Weather Too ! The Battery Is Like Nothing Seen Before ! Very Durable ! This Phone Is Fascinating ! A Lot To Learn ! Discovered The Home Button ! Mouth Piece Spot ! Adventure ! Thanks Again Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: t49y

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy J7 tracfone
customer_reviews.text: This track phone is as Verizon wireless customer service person says "that^s a piece of crap. Just send it back and get your money back." I did just that.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: So far it's not bad! The screen doesn't always register when touched, which can get annoying in certain situations. Call clarity is pretty good for a budget phone and it came preloaded with minutes.
customer_reviews.author: DDR

customer_reviews.title: No contracts, low payments
customer_reviews.text: I have used TracFone only as my phone for almost 20 years! I love my new Galaxy J7 Sky Pro. I haven't found anything yet that I don't like about it!!!!! TracFone meets all of my needs!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE FOR TRACFONE USE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE FOR TRACFONE USE! The firmware on the phone is obsolete and no longer usable for TracFone service. I found this out after two days working TracFone to try and activate the service. Also the phone was not shipped as it should and I had to pressure Amazon to get it to me on time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: NOT compatible with safelink.
customer_reviews.text: I asked questions about this phone before I bought it and read the questions to it being compatible with safelink and it said it was but after I've received it and tried to activate it safelink says it's not compatible as there is no cell phone tower through verizon in my area. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: angela godbey

customer_reviews.title: Nice advanced features
customer_reviews.text: Phabulous Phone! Nice advanced features. Extremely compatible with my 2017 Subaru Forester. Bluetooth operates flawlessly and I can play music, run the GPS map, and answer a phonecall from my steering wheel all at the same time. So much better than my previous phone model!
customer_reviews.author: Kat the Nomad

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a gift for my husband. He loves this phone........he can do everything on this phone and more that he couldn't
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone as a gift for my husband. He loves this phone. He can do everything that he wants and more. The size is just right for him. I don't think that there is anything about it that he doesn't like. The camera takes a good picture and it does flash.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  birthday gift son very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my son's 11th birthday he loves it works great looks new easy to use fast delivery using prime membership got it in 2 day's. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: marianela

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone battery life is good. It may not be a Apple or the or latest of Galaxy line but it is a very good phone my husband has used his for 2 years now and had one until i dropped it in water for a while. I bought for my 12 year daughter it all she needs and good phone
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: not good...
customer_reviews.text: i bought this phone because i had a tracfone plan already and just wanted an upgrade, but i received a headache. tracfone told me i needed a new sim card. i bought one. still wouldn't work. they sent me one. still wouldn't work. i was talking with tracfone customer service for a whole week! after the whole week. they told me, ''oh sorry, this wont work in your area.'' i did return the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone broke after six months.
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for six months and the ear speaker broke. Checked into having it repaired and it would cost as much as the phone. This is a locked tracphone. I think that Amazon should send me a new galaxy 7 that is locked to tracphone free of charge. I am a very good customer and will continue using Prime regardless. However I am very unsatisfied with this item. The phone is in a case and I take very good care of it. Please make good on this item. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Charging
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about 6 months now, and for some reason, it won't charge. I bought it brand new. I had a phone that was the same model for almost 3 years beforehand and it never gave me any issues with charging. It no longer charges on the original charger. I don't know why it isn't working, I guess I'll have to take it to a shop to get it fixed. Otherwise it works well and I have very few issues with it. This is a no brainer, but get a case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Vincent

customer_reviews.title: dont buy this buy simple mobile
customer_reviews.text: this is a sure way to for certain over pay for everytthing possible i thought this was simple mobile its also glitchy and ended up breaking it for being stupid minutes are the worst dont pay money to limit your self with over priced minutes "are these reveiwers stupid?" "go buyt your self discounted month to month basis phones dont be stupid and waste your money" unlimted simple mobile or metro pcs at the cheapest prices are far suppierior
customer_reviews.author: Jorge edison

customer_reviews.title: I've not killed it yet!
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for years and it's still going. You have to be tough to survive in my world, so I'm impressed. I use TracPhone because I'm cheap and it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Phone stopped working after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Only had this phone 6 weeks and phone has already stopped working. It will no longer receive or make calls and will no longer receive or send texts. I should have paid attention to others reviews, seems this problem is common! I have spent hours troubleshooting including 2 hours on the phone to tracfone and amazon and still not working. Can't return to amazon as 10 days past the 30 days return period, trying to claim off warranty which I'm thankful I took out. In the meantime, am without phone !!! Not happy, doesn't really deserve the 1 star given.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent Back
customer_reviews.text: I found I didn't need it, so I sent it back for a refund. I have a phone identical to this one & I am very happy with it now that it has been fixed from being dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Ron The Artiste'

customer_reviews.title: Real good phone overall
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Real good phone overall. Nice camera. Tracfone offer was added to my account when I activated the phone. Con: Headphone jack doesn't work. Not too huge a problem, I use a Wi-Fi speaker and I don't want to mess with a return
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good reception in marginal locations.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to set up for TracFone. Big screen, GPS, WiFi all work well. Good reception in marginal locations.
customer_reviews.author: dboyt

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever had. Amazing quality for such a inexpensive phone. My entire family is upgrading to this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought both my son and I one of these - they didn't let me down! Have had it awhile now and has never given me a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. Wanted android..more ram..larger size. But didn't want the cost of the S9. This fits the bill. Upgrade from the Core Prime (nice phone). Been with tracfone fore over a decade...always great service! And save sooooo much money!!!
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: The extra phone card is a very nice bonus.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and it's a good phone. I like the removable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia B.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, works perfect for what I needed it for! Is on older android version 6 which was perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: MULTIFACED

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone good price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter she loved it so much her brother got himself the same phone. They like the size which I wasn’t sure about at first.
customer_reviews.author: Poppet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent phone. Enough storage for apps. It is definitely going to be with me for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Igl

customer_reviews.title: All phone service providers are not alike
customer_reviews.text: The discription did not indicate who the service provider was and when we got the phone and activate it we found out it was a service provider that does not work in our area so this phone is virtually useless. There is no way to get a SIM card for a provider that will work for us. Lesson learned research first before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Quality and affordability.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many cell phones in the past and this one from Samsung is the best one that I have ever owned. The quality of this phone is unsurpassed by none. It is simple to use and has so many features compiled into one unit. I would recommend this phone to anyone that is looking to upgrade their current phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Giorgio

customer_reviews.title: It a great phone.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. I always loved Samsung phones. They work great. Never have a problem with them. I would tell any one that looking for a phone to get one of these phones.
customer_reviews.author: brenda stacy

customer_reviews.title: Bigger screen with speed and power.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a number of phones and I find this phone to be great has a bigger screen with plenty of speed and power.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mc Allister

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Sky Pro is a great smartphone!!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome smartphone! Very happy with this phone, storage, screen size and resolution are outstanding! The price is a plus too! If you want a reasonably priced smartphone this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Three Dogs' Dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, bad tower
customer_reviews.text: Unit was fine, but for reason only smarter people then me know the phone would not connect to the tower. I would purchase the phone again. I did like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bland

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone for my husband who needed an upgrade. It provides smart phone capabilities so he could access Google maps.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa E. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! It's a little workhorse, it's fast, it's intuitive, it's done everything I've asked of it and it takes great pictures too!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wieden

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this phone
customer_reviews.text: Save your money this phone is terrible & shame on Samsung for putting their name to it and shame on Amazon for selling it...
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great memory
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone best I've owned thus far has more memory than my tab 4 as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Niehoff

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone has really been a good low cost phone. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: camera photo quality
customer_reviews.text: Just not satisfied with the camera photo quality. Reordered a J7 Crown..camera quality is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Montana

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, can't update!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon should not sell this. Phone cannot be activated because Samsung is no longer updating this model software. Had to send it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Hartunee

customer_reviews.title: you will have to call customer service to active phone
customer_reviews.text: Setting the phone was easy however you will have to call customer service. I had no problem having them switching my number to the new phone it was just going to take a while for the updates to happens. Once they were updated. All issue where resolved, the screen is bigger and I can actually read it better. During Prime week this phone was worth buying for my wife. She likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Sumerlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone for kids
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice phone and cheap too. My 11 year old bought it for his birthday. He doesn’t use the prepaid minutes- just connects to WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Switch it to straight talk
customer_reviews.text: Phone is awesome, didn't like Trac phone plans. Was able to switch to straight talk plans very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Samsung phone so much better Android than LG. Does all you need it to do! Like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Janie McKune

customer_reviews.title: Great update.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Installed easy. Fast Tracfone transfer from older model.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for its price
customer_reviews.text: While other phones have longer batteries or better cameras, this is a great phone for the average user. Pop a big SD card in and it'll go longer, just requires close attention to where your apps store their info. I've had 3 (cause I'm a clutz) and recommend it for the casual user.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Jones

customer_reviews.title: great phone at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the 16 GB internal memory. Gift for my wife who loves the 5.5" screen. The price was below the promotional price offered by the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: richard kubis

customer_reviews.title: I like this phone
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with this phone. I did not want to pay a fortune for a phone. It does everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lonard

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it activated what so ever i never had this much trouble in my life with Tracfone payed 73 bucks and cant use it
customer_reviews.author: Danielle mizell

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone, best phone I have had to date. TracFone is better than any plan I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Biccum

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone for the price, I just use it for music and video chating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TracFone Samsung Galaxy J7 Sky Pro 4G LTE Prepaid Smartphone
product_meta.description: Stay connected with the Tracfone Samsung Galaxy J7 Sky Pro 4G LTE prepaid smartphone. Capture memories with the 8MP camera/5MP front-facing camera/video recorder and bring them to life on the touchscreen display. This prepaid smartphone's wide Dimension ensures it fits well in your Palms for better handling. Running Marshmallow, the Android smartphone features a 1.4GHz quad-core processor, leading to better performance and quicker in-device communication. The Bluetooth V4.2 ensures your device is Compatible with a broad range of devices while Providing faster data transfer. With a powerful battery, the Tracfone Samsung Galaxy J7 Sky Pro S727 4G LTE prepaid smartphone ensures long talk hours and standby time. The Wi-Fi and GPS capabilities of the device allow you to explore the world around you and when you're looking for new fun, you can easily find something out of the 1, 000, 000+ apps available on Google play.
feature_bullets: 5.5" HD screen; 1.4 GHz quad-core processor; Android 6.0 Marshmallow
4G LTE; Wi-Fi capable; Bluetooth 4.2 wireless technology; MP3 Player
8 MP Camera/5 MP front facing Camera; Internal memory 16 GB; supports Micro SD memory card up to 256GB (not included)
This phone does not Triple. Most GSM and CDMA smartphones are compatible.USAGE TIME Talk time up to 31 Hrs

Note: This phone is carrier locked; Customers must have had their locked device activated on TracFone service for no fewer than 12 months, redeemed air time cards in no fewer than 12 months, and not have had their telephone number recycled or ported

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars849 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Wall Charger, Phone, Service Guide, Instruction Manual
